definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: Results Macroscopically, the tumor appeared as a hard grayish-white mass.
sentences.chinese: 結果大體檢查腫瘤呈質硬灰白色腫塊。

sentences.english: The towering cloud is circular. It is surrounded by hazy, gray-white smoke.
sentences.chinese: 堆起的雲團呈圓形，其被模糊的灰白色煙霧所籠罩。

sentences.english: Manganese is a hard, brittle, gray-white metal.
sentences.chinese: 錳是一種灰白色的，又硬又脆的金屬。

sentences.english: White or off-white color powder inside the capsule.
sentences.chinese: 膠囊內藥粉爲白色或灰白色粉末。

sentences.english: He squeezed the steering wheel until his knuckles turned ash- gray.
sentences.chinese: 他的手狠狠地攥着方向盤，指節都變成了灰白色。

sentences.english: Most of the upper lobe toward the right has a pale tan to grey appearance.
sentences.chinese: 右肺上葉大部分區域呈現灰白色外觀。
這棟房子被漆成灰白色。

sentences.english: The millimeter-wave machine is grayish-white and is more cylindrical.
sentences.chinese: 而毫米波掃描儀則是灰白色的，有些像圓柱形。
淡灰白色魚肉的比目魚。

sentences.english: Once the salts melt, a gray-white substance is left. This is potash.
sentences.chinese: 一旦鹽份融會，會留下灰白色的物質，這就是碳酸鉀。

sentences.english: The cut surface of this tumor has a soft, lobulated, white to tan appearance.
sentences.chinese: 腫瘤切面質地軟，呈片狀，灰白色。

sentences.english: Grossly, the tumors are poorly circumscribed, gray-white, and may have flecks of calcification.
sentences.chinese: 大體上，腫瘤邊界不清，灰白色，可見鈣化點。

sentences.english: Seen over the surface of the epicardium are pale white-tan nodules of metastatic tumor.
sentences.chinese: 在心外膜的表面可見灰白色轉移性腫瘤結節。

sentences.english: Mineralization relates closely to the grey-white silicified rock.
sentences.chinese: 金礦化與早期灰白色硅化巖密切相關。

sentences.english: At necropsy, muscles in the leg were white or greyish -white.
sentences.chinese: 屍檢主要見腿部肌肉色白或灰白色。

sentences.english: A mockingbird is a kind of gray songbird.
sentences.chinese: 知更鳥是一種灰白色的會唱歌的鳥。
